title: Mobile-Based Interactive Language Education for Science Field Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced specialized terminology in science and foundational language proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhancing language proficiency with scientific context in a smartphone-accessible microlearning environment, emphasizing workplace applicability for current practitioners

learning_goals: Capable of listening to and understanding specialized terminology related to scientific topics with over 80% accuracy.
Select appropriate language expressions for situational contexts in interactive video disk-based scenarios with over 70% accuracy.
Demonstrate the ability to apply language contextually through science-based mini-projects (3 sessions) provided in a mobile environment.

resources: Science Domain Context-Specific Dialogue Scenario Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
